title: PLEASE HELP ACCOUNT HACKER(FIXED) BUT HACKER BOUGHT RP!
body: So recently when i was at a party i got an email saying that i bought 50€ worth of rp which i did not and i contacted riot support about it and they have responded by change your password and verify your email they didnt acknowledge that the hacker bought rp with my credit card which i havent used on lol since 2 years and every time you buy rp u need to enter the cards cvc which i do not know how the hacker got so what should i do so riot gives me my money back i do not want 8200 rp!

replies.body: i get hacked and the hacker bought with my rp to gift him self i wanna my rp back

Please do not dispute the charge just yet!  Make sure to respond in the ticket with one of our Billing Specialists.  If they were able to confirm that your Credit Card was used without your knowledge by a hacker, they should be able to reverse the changes to your account and get this resolved.
Dispute the charge with your credit company or bank; you should not have to pay. Riot will likely be more responsive when dealing with them.
